verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְעֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֬ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David נְאֻֽם־ <WH5002> saith פֶּ֣שַׁע <WH6588> The transgression לָ֭רָשָׁע <WH7563> of the wicked בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> within לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> my heart אֵֽין־ <WH369> There פַּ֥חַד <WH6343> [that there is] no fear אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> before his eyes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֶחֱלִ֣יק <WH2505> For he flattereth אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> himself in his own eyes לִמְצֹ֖א <WH4672> be found עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> until his iniquity לִשְׂנֹֽא׃ <WH8130> to be hateful

דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> The words פִ֭יו <WH6310> of his mouth אָ֣וֶן <WH205> [are] iniquity וּמִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> and deceit חָדַ֖ל <WH2308> he hath left off לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> to be wise לְהֵיטִֽיב׃ <WH3190> [and] to do good

אָ֤וֶן ׀ <WH205> mischief יַחְשֹׁ֗ב <WH2803> He deviseth עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ <WH4904> upon his bed יִ֭תְיַצֵּב <WH3320> he setteth עַל־ <WH5921> on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> himself in a way לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [that is] not good רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> not evil לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִמְאָֽס׃ <WH3988> he abhorreth

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> [is] in the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> Thy mercy אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> [and] thy faithfulness עַד־ <WH5704> to שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> [reacheth] unto the clouds

צִדְקָֽתְךָ֨ ׀ <WH6666> Thy righteousness כְּֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> mountains אֵ֗ל <WH410> [is] like the great מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶךָ <WH4941> thy judgments תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> deep רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> [are] a great אָ֤דָֽם־ <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and beast תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> thou preservest יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּקָ֥ר <WH3368> How excellent חַסְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> [is] thy lovingkindness אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> O God וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> therefore the children אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of men בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <WH3671> of thy wings יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃ <WH2620> put their trust

יִ֭רְוְיֻן <WH7301> They shall be abundantly satisfied מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן <WH1880> with the fatness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> of thy house וְנַ֖חַל <WH5158> of the river עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ <WH5730> of thy pleasures תַשְׁקֵֽם׃ <WH8248> and thou shalt make them drink

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עִ֭מְּךָ <WH5973> You מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> For with thee [is] the fountain חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ <WH216> in thy light נִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> shall we see אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> light

מְשֹׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> O continue חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> thy lovingkindness לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ <WH3045> unto them that know וְ֝צִדְקָֽתְךָ֗ <WH6666> thee and thy righteousness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> to the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart

אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי <WH935> come רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Let not the foot גַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH1346> of pride וְיַד־ <WH3027> against me and let not the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃ <WH5110> remove

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There נָ֭פְלוּ <WH5307> fallen פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> There are the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity דֹּ֝ח֗וּ <WH1760> they are cast down וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָ֥כְלוּ <WH3201> and shall not be able קֽוּם׃ <WH6965> to rise
